page.title: 16 EVENTS IN SUTTON
page.content: THE FRIENDS OF SUTTON CHURCH The Friends of Sutton Church is a group of people whose aim is to raise money for the upkeep of All Saints Church in Sutton.A variety of events is organised throughout the year in order to do this.Two major events are the Flower Festival and the Safari Supper. THE FLOWER FESTIVAL This is usually held in September and lasts over a weekend.The church is decorated with many flowers arranged around a theme.In 1984,the theme was "The Magic of Music". THE SAFARI SUPPER This popular event takes place in June.There are 7 courses to the supper and each is taken at a different house in the village starting at one end with sherry and ending with coffee at the other end of the village.
